patterns: what are the courses offered in your university?
what are the courses in diu?
can you tell me the courses available in Daffodil?
can you tell me the branches available in daffodil?
responses:
We are offering 38 undergraduate and graduate programs under 26 departments.
For knowing all programs details.
Please visit this link:[Click Here](https://daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/programs)

patterns: what is the process of course registration?
How do I complete course registration in the semester?
how do I complete course registration in the semester?
where i need to go for course registration?
tell me about course registration process?
responses:
If you are new student: At first you have to collect your account clearance by paying the registration fees in Account Section and then you have to come department office along with your filled up StudentInsurance Form (given during the Admission). Then you have to submit your account clearance form and insurance form in department office to complete your registration. After the registration, you have to check the student portal (http://studentportal.diu.edu.bd/login) to be sure about your registration.
 If you are regular student: At first, you have to collect your account clearance from the Account Section by paying fees of registration and then you have to submit it ( Keep a photocopy) to your batch coordinator. He/she will complete your course registration as per the rule. After the completion, you have to check the student portal to be sure about the course registration.

patterns: how can i change my subject after registration?
how can i change my course after registration?
how can i change my course?
is it possible change or drop subject after complete registration?
responses: After the registration, you may be able to Change/Add/Drop your subject within 7 days after the last date of the registration. To Change/Add/Drop your subject, you must meet your batch coordinator. He/she will help to complete the work.

patterns: what is the process of drop semester?
how can i drop my semester?
what is the process of  semester drop?
tell me procedure about drop semester
What can I do to drop the semester?
responses:
Before complete course registration: In case for specific reason, if you could not pay your registration fees and did not complete the registration, then you must drop the semester in the student portal.
 After complete course registration: In case after the registration, if you need to drop the semester, you have to write an application for approval and submit to the department office. The signed application must be submitted to the Dean Office within 2 weeks of the last date of registration. After the approval of the Dean, You need to submit it to the Registrar Office for final approval. One week later you need to check the student portal and contact to the department office to be sure about the semester drop.

patterns: What about the courses of previous syllabus?
Do I register myself with previous code as I am a student of previous syllabus?
is it possible to register previous syllabus?
how can i register previous syllabus?
responses: Students can do registration with previous syllabus with an application to the Head of the department.

patterns: What can I do for registration when the registration date is over?
i'm late how to complete my registration
tell me about late registration procedure
responses: The late registration process is given in the notice board. Please follow the instructions and contact to the department office for further help.

patterns: I have already dropped three or more semesters (without informing). Now I want to continue my study.
semester dropped but i want to continue?
drop some semester now what i do?
responses: Please follow the instructions of re-admission given in the notice board and contact to the department office.

patterns: I want to take extra courses next semester?
what is the process of extra course registration?
how can i take extra course?
responses: Students may apply to the Dean through Head of the department.

patterns: When the courses will be offered for (Spring /Fall) this semester?
responses:
In a year two semester Spring and Fall. Office will publish the courses offer on notice board. Follow the notice board.(online / department notice board).
For online application:[Click Here](https://pd.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/admission/online)
You can simply ask next semester for schedule.
For admission just ask next admission.

patterns: how can i registration for one course in as semester?
is it possible take only one course in a semester?
how can i registration one more course after my course registration completed?
responses: Students can do that but have to write an application to the head of the Department. If Dean approves then it is allowed.

patterns: What is the process of doing duel-major?
responses: If the student wants to do duel-major he has to communicate with the department office. The office will provide a guideline for the student which he will follow during the rest of the semesters. Because in order to do duel-major he need to complete 1 elective course, 7 course from the first major and 5 courses from the second major.

patterns: What is the fees of improvement exam?
how much cost need for improvement exam?
responses: The student have to pay 40% of the course fee to attend the mid-term improvement exam and 60% for the final.

patterns: How I can give midterm improvement exam?
how i can give final improvement exam?
where i contact for improvement exam?
tell me about improvement exam process?
responses: Collect the improvement form from the department office and fill up the form. Then go to accounts section and pay required fees for improvement exam which in to be signed by accounts section for clearance.Then you submit the form to the department office.

patterns: How can I select Supervisor for defense?
How can I select Supervisor for internship?
for supervisor where  i should go?
tell me about supervisor select process?
responses: Contact your Head who will assign your supervisor for project & thesis.

patterns: where i find my quiz result?
how can i see my final result?
how can i see my class attendance percentage
process of see quiz result, final result,midterm result?
responses:
From website: At first browse DIU website then follow the right side where there is an option of virtual university & then click on & put your ID on Academic Result option.
>you can find quiz,attendance percentage,mid result from diu portal sidebar live result option.
>you can find semester final result on diu portal sidebar result option.

patterns: what is minimum cgpa for certificate?
can i get certificate if my cgpa 2.90?
responses: The minimum CGPA is 2.50 to get the certificate.

patterns: what is the minimum result for improvement exam?
my result B+ can i give  improvement exam?
i got b+ a-  can i give improvement exam?
i get A+ can i give improvement exam?
responses: Students those who got 'Grade B' or less may apply for improvement.

patterns: why i can't see my result?
why i cant see my result
i cant see my result why?
responses: Clear your previous dues and contact with Registrar Office/Exam Office for removal of block result.

patterns: How I can take concern letter/ testimonial for job purposes.?
where i contact for my testimonial?
responses:
Take application form and fill up the form. Attach the photocopy of final Transcript. Pay 50 taka at DIU accounts section. Take accounts clearance and submit to the concerned Department/Registrar Office.
For concern letter: For getting a concern letter you have to deposit TK. 50 to Accounts section. Then bring the money receipt to department office write your father and mother name backside of the money receipt.

patterns: When I will be allowed for provisional certificate?
responses: When you will complete all required credits for the degree but not to attend at convocation then you will be allowed for provisional certificate.

patterns: How can I withdraw academic transcripts/ certificate?
responses: Collect form from DIU exam office and fill-up the form and submit to the exam section.

patterns: how can i get recommendation letter?
responses: For getting recommendation letter have to pay 50 taka to Accounts section. Then submit an application to department office. Describe briefly on application.

patterns: i cant use my varsity email?
where i solve my email problem?
how to solve my email problem?
responses:
You need to pay =20/- to Account section and fill the register book from the department office for specific problem.
Department office will send a mail to IT section  to solve the problem.

patterns: How can I get my class routine of the semester?

responses: At first, you have to go to the Police Station to do a General Dairy (GD). After getting the GD paper, you have to submit it to the Admission Section. The Admission Section will give you the further instruction.

patterns: What is the process of teaching evaluation?
how i complete my teaching evaluation?
where i complete my teaching evaluation?
i cant complete my teaching evaluation?
responses:
Login to student portal and update the profile. After that fill the evaluation form and submit it.
Note: Every end of semester need teaching evaluation complete for view semester result and maintain every course 75% attendacne.

patterns: what is the process collect laptop?
what is the process collect diu laptop?
when i find my laptop from my varsity?
responses:
It's joyful. Diu has one student one laptop project. Every student gets a laptop.
>Diu will give you an email when you are eligible for a laptop.
>At least complete 4th semester.
>Maintain minimum SGPA 2.5 and payment should be clear up to the last semester.
>Need complete two course on goedu.ac .
>More details you can visit:[Click Here](https://laptop.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/index.php/apply-and-instruction/instruction-for-laptop-receive)
Our University has Excellent Infrastructure. Campus is clean. Good IT Labs With Good Speed of Internet connection.More information need please visit our campus. you are always welcome
